Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
WE SAVE THE GALAXY: POWER: If Kid Loki is adjacent to a friendly WOTR #053a The Destroyer, give that The Destroyer a MOVE action as FREE. After resolutions, The Destroyer may make an attack.

Without going too deep into spoiler territory, the version of Kid Loki depicted in this dial is [I]technically[/I] a different character than the one on the Young Avengers roster, though I will join you in lamenting the lack of a Kid Loki with the keyword. Fortunately he can join Wiccan and Hulking on Guardians of the Galaxy teams, so that's something.

I don't think he's useless on his own by any means. You need Leadership. You usually need TK. If you're playing Mystical, getting that on one figure for 50 points or less, your other option is pretty much dropping some coin on Venom Strange.
